This is an interesting place!\""},{"lineNumber":201884,"originalJapaneseLine":"どちらかが落ちてもいいように、","translatedEnglishLine":"So that if either one of us falls,"},{"lineNumber":201885,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたは手を繋いで、","translatedEnglishLine":"you suggested we hold hands,"},{"lineNumber":201886,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゆっくり進むことを提案した。","translatedEnglishLine":"and proceed slowly."},{"lineNumber":201887,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐわはははは！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Guwahahaha!"},{"lineNumber":201888,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いいだろう！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Sounds good!\""},{"lineNumber":201889,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よし！　行くぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright! Don't fall behind!\""},{"lineNumber":201916,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたは半ば元就に引っ張られるようにして、","translatedEnglishLine":"You were half pulled along by Motonari,"},{"lineNumber":201917,"originalJapaneseLine":"危険地帯をズンズンと進んで行った。","translatedEnglishLine":"as you steadily advanced through the dangerous area."},{"lineNumber":201918,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":201919,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よし！　＜エール＞！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright! <Yell>!\""},{"lineNumber":201920,"originalJapaneseLine":"「オレの嫁になれ！！！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Become my wife!!!!\""},{"lineNumber":201921,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………。」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":201922,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":201923,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　＜ずるっ！！！！＞","translatedEnglishLine":"  <Slip!!!!>"},{"lineNumber":201924,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたは足を滑らせて、","translatedEnglishLine":"You slipped,"},{"lineNumber":201925,"originalJapaneseLine":"雲の地面を突き抜けてしまった。","translatedEnglishLine":"piercing through the cloud ground."},{"lineNumber":201926,"originalJapaneseLine":"両足が青い空に溶けるように、","translatedEnglishLine":"Both your feet swayed, melting into the blue sky,"},{"lineNumber":201927,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぷらぷらと揺れていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"dangling and trembling."},{"lineNumber":201928,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐわっははは！　どうした、大将！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Guwahaha! What's wrong, General!"},{"lineNumber":201929,"originalJapaneseLine":"　足を滑らせるとはらしくない！」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's unlike you to slip your footing!\""},{"lineNumber":201930,"originalJapaneseLine":"落ちずに済んでいるのは、","translatedEnglishLine":"The reason you hadn’t fallen was because"},{"lineNumber":201931,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたの腕を地上の元就が","translatedEnglishLine":"the Motonari on the ground was"},{"lineNumber":201932,"originalJapaneseLine":"掴んでくれているからだった。","translatedEnglishLine":"holding onto your arm."},{"lineNumber":201933,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yo!\""},{"lineNumber":201934,"originalJapaneseLine":"たった一息で元就はあなたを雲の地面まで","translatedEnglishLine":"With a single pull, Motonari lifted you back up to the cloud ground."},{"lineNumber":201935,"originalJapaneseLine":"引き上げてくれた。","translatedEnglishLine":"He pulled you up."},{"lineNumber":201936,"originalJapaneseLine":"「クク、なんだその間の抜けた顔は。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe, what's with that dumbfounded face?"},{"lineNumber":201937,"originalJapaneseLine":"　オレの求婚はそんなに笑えたか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Did my proposal make you laugh that much?\""},{"lineNumber":201938,"originalJapaneseLine":"「オレはお前とこうしていると楽しい！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I enjoy being with you like this!"},{"lineNumber":201939,"originalJapaneseLine":"　夫婦-ﾒｵﾄ-になればそれが毎日続く！","translatedEnglishLine":"If we become husband and wife, that will continue every day!"},{"lineNumber":201940,"originalJapaneseLine":"　だから嫁になれ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"So become my wife!\""},{"lineNumber":201941,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐわっはははは！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Guwahahahaha!"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スシヌは何故かカタコトになっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For some reason, Sushinu was speaking in broken phrases.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「クカカカ！　面白いとこよ！」
どちらかが落ちてもいいように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So that if either one of us falls,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは手を繋いで、
ゆっくり進むことを提案した。
「ぐわはははは！
いいだろう！」
「よし！　行くぞ！」
先程までの説明など何も聞いていなかったのか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As if he hadn't heard any of the explanations from before,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 足下を探ることもせずに、
元就はズンズンと進んで行く。
「おっと」
元就は何度も足を滑らせかけるので、
その度にあなたは元就の体を支えることとなった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and each time you had to support his body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐわはははは！
大将には手間をかけるな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't give the general any trouble!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは死ぬのが怖くないのかと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You somewhat asked if he wasn't afraid of dying.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとなく聞いてみた。
「ふんっ」
「人間死ぬ時は死ぬ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "When it's time for a person to die, they die.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ならば大事なのはどう生きるかのみ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then what's important is only how you live.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「故に、毛利の人間は死など恐れん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Therefore, the people of Mouri do not fear death.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本当に怖いのは死ぬことではなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The thing truly frightening is not death,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 生をまっとうできないことと知っているからだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but knowing you cannot fulfill your life.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……と、母殿は言っていた」
「この意味が分かるか？」
「オレには分からん！！！！
サッパリだ！！！！」
「意味は分からんが母殿の言葉なら信じられる！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't get the meaning, but if it's my mother's words, I can believe them!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だからお前も死ぬことなど気にするな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So don't worry about dying either!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐわはははははははは！
さあ、ドンドン進むぞ！」
「大将！　遅れるなよ！」
あなたは半ば元就に引っ張られるようにして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You were half pulled along by Motonari,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 危険地帯をズンズンと進んで行った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: as you steadily advanced through the dangerous area.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よし！　＜エール＞！」
「オレの嫁になれ！！！！」
あなたは足を滑らせて、
雲の地面を突き抜けてしまった。
両足が青い空に溶けるように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Both your feet swayed, melting into the blue sky,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぷらぷらと揺れていた。
「ぐわっははは！　どうした、大将！
足を滑らせるとはらしくない！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's unlike you to slip your footing!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 落ちずに済んでいるのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The reason you hadn’t fallen was because

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたの腕を地上の元就が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the Motonari on the ground was

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 掴んでくれているからだった。
「よっ！」
たった一息で元就はあなたを雲の地面まで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a single pull, Motonari lifted you back up to the cloud ground.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 引き上げてくれた。
「クク、なんだその間の抜けた顔は。
オレの求婚はそんなに笑えたか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Did my proposal make you laugh that much?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「オレはお前とこうしていると楽しい！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I enjoy being with you like this!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夫婦-ﾒｵﾄ-になればそれが毎日続く！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If we become husband and wife, that will continue every day!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから嫁になれ！」
「ぐわっはははは！

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
